content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
Get the best titles from Ubisoft’s summer catalog with the Summer of Fun bundle which includes these exciting games at 30% off:

Zombi
A great plague has shrouded London in a fog of death. The unprepared die or are infected by a sickness more gruesome than death. The nail-biting experience of ZombiU™ is now available on the PS4™ system. Test your will to survive, but beware: one wrong move can cause you to lose everything.

Toy Soldiers: War Chest
This is a fast-paced genre-bending mix of strategy defense and action that brings to life four unique toy-inspired factions - Kaiser, Starbright, Phantom and the Dark Lord. Play with up to 3 other friends in the different multiplayer modes.

Grow Home
Experience the freedom of unbounded climbing as you take control of BUD, a procedurally animated robot on a quest to save his planet. Create your own path through an alien world as you control and ride a giant plant on a vertical journey to the stars.


1-4 players
DUALSHOCK®4
1080p HD Video Output

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.
